channel.title: Adderall
channel.description:
I know moparscape typically avoids "drug topics" but I'm in a shitty situation. Took a 40mg XR of adderall earlier, first time doing adderall so 0 tolerance. Was nice awhile ago, but now I can't fucking sleep. Took it at 12:30pm, currently 1:30 am.
For those who know or are online, how long is it gonna take to get this shit outta my system? Gotta wakeup 6:45 for school tomorrow and I'd like to get atleast 3 or 4 hours of sleep. Will this happen or should I just keep browsing the web for 5 more hours?

item.title: Adderall
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Team_Rocket:

Adderall is pretty much like Speed in a pill form… I advise you to stop taking it. (and any other uppers)

It was a one time thing. I probably had to much and will only do it on rare occasions, such as finals. I also know what to expect now, it was pretty intense considering I had 0 tolerance for it.

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:11, topic:474934”]Is there anywhere you can buy this legally(UK)? or something similar which makes you focus more
I don’t have ADHD etc but I think it’d help with college as I find it hard to concentrate on things I’m not interested in and easily get distracted. So if it helps you focus I think it’d help o.o.[/quote]

It requires a prescription, however there is a decent chance you know someone who has ADHD and you can buy it off of them. General prices are $1 for every 10mg. I’ve heard in colleges that, during finals week, prices can go up to 2,3, even $5 for 10mg. If you just wanted to prep, I recommend 10-15mg, 20 max. You shouldn’t need any more.

Read full topic

item.title: Adderall
item.dc:creator: @gravenfire23 gravenfire23
item.description:
@gravenfire23 wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:10, topic:474934”]Adderall is pretty much like Speed in a pill form… I advise you to stop taking it. (and any other uppers)[/quote]It actually is an amphetamine making it speed. Its not that bad for you as long as you dont abuse it.

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:11, topic:474934”]Is there anywhere you can buy this legally(UK)? or something similar which makes you focus more
I don’t have ADHD etc but I think it’d help with college as I find it hard to concentrate on things I’m not interested in and easily get distracted. So if it helps you focus I think it’d help o.o.[/quote]I’m quite sure you need to be prescribed it. I’m sure you could just find a buddy who gets it prescribed and buy it off him.

Read full topic

item.title: Adderall
item.dc:creator: @classic mopmans little slave
item.description:
@classic wrote:

I take Adderall at a small dose aswell, to help with focusing in school (10mg)

I don’t know why you’d try it for fun, its not very relaxing and you lose appetite

Read full topic

@jme wrote:

lmfao

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:4, topic:474934”]Darn it rey I expected better of you

What exactly is adderall? Never heard of it[/quote]

Speed / Amphetamines. Not good

item.title: Adderall
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Hell of a day. Makes you lack appetite so you’re super hungry later. I’ve had to take food slow today, but all good now.

Read full topic

item.title: Adderall
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

Oh funny… I get the oppsite effect, super tired then extremely trippin.

Read full topic

item.title: Adderall
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

If you have ADHD, it helps you focus. If you don’t, you’re really wired then super focused. Finished night with about 2:30 hours of sleep. I’m oddly not as tired as I should be atm.

Read full topic

item.title: Adderall
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

item.title: Adderall
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Lin:

http://answers.yahoo.com/question/index?qid=20100501213152AAGWxHl Should answer your question.

Uhg thanks. 2:45, can’t fucking pass out. I’m at the 14 hour mark about now, and it’s frustrating. I’m bored and hungry and the wonderful effects of amphetamines that I’ve never had are being a bitch. Probably shouldn’t have done such a high dosage for my first time.

Read full topic
